title: The Wall Street Journal: Missouri governor coerced woman into sex act, legislative report finds
text:
A special Missouri legislative committee issued a report Wednesday detailing a sexual encounter between Republican Gov. Eric Greitens and an unnamed hairdresser, who testified the then-candidate photographed her bound, blindfolded and partially naked and then threatened to release the photos if she divulged the affair.
The woman also testified that Mr. Greitens ripped off her shirt, spanked her and coerced her into performing a sexual act, according to the report.
...
